pages.title: Starsteel
pages.text: Starsteel is a rare and powerful material that can be used to craft powerful tools and armor.
It is created by infusing Netherite Ingots with a Nether Star
When crafted into a block, this Starsteel is nearly indestructible. It is as hard to mine as obsidian and cannot be exploded by any means and mobs will not spawn on top of it.
